title: Historical Causal Reasoning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of historical events and familiarity with social science fundamentals
context.additional_context: Emphasizes integration with scientific research methodologies, utilizing digital collaboration tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain causal relationships between primary and secondary concepts in historical events
Learners can write explanatory texts evaluating the credibility of historical sources by applying scientific reasoning strategies
Learners can present three or more interpretive frameworks through causal modeling in team-based inquiry tasks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
